name: Sesterce
description: Sesterce Money (SES) is a store of wealth, on the ERC-20 ecosystem, offers growth potential and is designed to be a medium of exchange for goods and services. By holding SES, users can protect their financial assets from inflation and volatility, preserving their value over time. Additionally, Sesterce aims to facilitate secure peer-to-peer transactions and enable cross-border value transfer, making it an efficient medium of exchange for everyday transactions.
